title: Wackiest Wagon Train in the West (Western, 1976) Bob Denver, Forrest Tucker, Ivor Francis | Movie

sources.title: Wackiest Wagon Train in the West (Western, 1976) Bob Denver, Forrest Tucker, Ivor Francis | Movie
sources.description:
The misadventurous journey of a hapless wagonmaster and his clumsy assistant as they lead a diverse group of seven passengers, including two wealthy Bostonians, an aspiring showgirl, a teacher, and a bachelor, through the Wild West. As mishaps unfold, the group must use their wit to overcome challenges and reach their destination in California.

Original title: The Wackiest Wagon Train in the West (1976)

This movie is subtitled in many languages.

Directors: Jack Arnold, Earl Bellamy
Writers: Sherwood Schwartz, Elroy Schwartz 
Stars: Bob Denver, Forrest Tucker, Ivor Francis, Jeannine Riley
Genres: Western, Comedy 


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
04:34 A chaotic wagon train journey is further complicated by the discovery of a wounded Indian boy.
13:38 Unconventional rescue mission led by wagon train members to save Betsy and Andy from the Hackamaws.
25:22 Dusty's adventures with a wild horse and a broken telegraph key.
28:45 Courtroom drama unfolds as Dusty faces accusations of horse theft, leading to a surprising turn of events.
36:59 A comedic western unfolds as Dusty and his friends face a hanging, an escape, and a wild stallion.
44:50 A group prepares to defend against cattle thieves by using a clever disguise strategy.
53:27 A comedic Western film where two women are kidnapped by outlaws seeking to get friendly with them.
1:06:09 A group of travelers arrives at a deserted town and senses trouble lurking as they explore.
1:09:23 Unraveling a mystery in a deserted town, a group encounters outlaws and comedic chaos ensues.
1:15:26 A comedic western film where a brave wagon master faces off against dangerous outlaws to save a town.
1:23:18 A comedic western film where a character impersonates Bat Masterson to outsmart the Skullner brothers.
